About the Company: Agro Tech Foods Ltd is a public limited company engaged in the business of marketing food and food ingredients to consumers and institutional customers. The company is affiliated to ConAgra Foods, Inc of USA, which is one the world`s largest food companies.The company is also engaged in the production of agricultural products. They are operating in three segments: Sourcing and Institutional Business, Branded Foods and Others. Sourcing and Institutional Business segment includes oils and agricultural raw materials procurement, crystal and rath bulk packs, the seed buying and processing operations, food service and poultry feed ingredients. The Branded Foods segment includes products sold under the brands of Sundrop, Crystal, Rath, Sudham, and Healthy World. Others includes seed operations.
